projects.title: Visualization of Logistic Infrastructure
projects.subtitle: Java TS WildFly MySQL JPA JMI
projects.content: I Developed a real-time web application for visualizing complex logistics infrastructure. The frontend, built with TypeScript and Konva.js, renders an interactive map that updates live via a Java WebSocket server. The system's backend features a distributed architecture: a standalone Java application processes data telegrams from PLCs and updates a MySQL database (using JPA/Hibernate) via a WildFly-hosted REST API. This API also provides additional data to the web app and exposes special controller functions via JMI and JMX.
projects.tldr: A full-stack, real-time logistics visualization system using Java, Node.js, Konva.js, and a distributed backend to display live PLC data.

projects.title: SOPRA: Deserts of Dune - University Project
projects.subtitle: Java JSON
projects.content: As part of a two-semester university course (SOPRA), I was a primary developer on a team of five creating "Deserts of Dune," a 3X strategy game. My main responsibility was the architecture and development of the Java-based game server. The server was engineered to manage all game logic, track state, and handle communication for multiple clients (up to 4) and multiple game instances concurrently. To ensure interoperability between clients and servers developed by different teams, we collaborated to define a standardized JSON-based messaging protocol.
projects.tldr: Developed the core Java backend for a multiplayer 3X university strategy game, managing concurrent game instances, state, and client communication.

projects.title: Portfolio v1
projects.subtitle: Svelte Tailwind CSS Firebase
projects.content: My first personal portfolio website, designed to serve as a dynamic online resume. Built using the modern JavaScript framework Svelte and styled with Tailwind CSS, it effectively showcases my skills, featured projects, and professional experience. The static site is deployed globally using Firebase Hosting.
projects.tldr: My first portfolio website, built with Svelte and Tailwind CSS, and deployed via Firebase.

projects.title: Portfolio Self hosted
projects.subtitle: Angular Cloudflare
projects.content: My current, updated personal portfolio website. This version was developed using Angular to create a more robust single-page application (SPA) for showcasing my projects, skills, and experience. A key aspect of this project was moving away from third-party hosting; the site is now self-hosted and securely exposed to the internet using Cloudflare Tunnels.
projects.tldr: My current portfolio, built with Angular and self-hosted securely using Cloudflare Tunnels.

projects.title: Compass
projects.subtitle: Kotlin Ktor Angular Express JWT
projects.content: An alpha full-stack application named "Compass." The backend is built with Kotlin and Ktor, providing a REST API for database read/write operations. The API is secured using JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for authentication. The frontend is a corresponding Angular web application, providing the UI for user-friendly data interaction and authentication against the server.
projects.tldr: A full-stack application featuring a Kotlin/Ktor backend with JWT-secured REST endpoints and an Angular frontend for the UI.

about.introduction: I am a Full-Stack Software Developer with focus on Java Applications. I also know my way around the Web with TypeScript and Angular.

hobbies.name: Scouting
hobbies.description: I’ve been a Scout for a long time. After 5 years of leading a group of 10-to-13-year-olds, I’ve moved into the role of managing our Digital Infrastructure and PR.

hobbies.name: Musician
hobbies.description: I play the guitar and keyboard, and I’m currently scratching my way through learning the violin (it’s a work in progress!).

hobbies.name: Gamer
hobbies.description: I am a huge RPG fan. If you want to talk about why Final Fantasy VI is the best in the series, I’m your person. I also love The Elder Scrolls and will never get tired of Pokémon. If I only have a few minutes to spare, you'll catch me playing Tetris.

hobbies.name: Photographer
hobbies.description: I love capturing moments. Most of my personal photography focuses on animals and nature, but thanks to my PR role in the Scouts, I also have plenty of experience shooting live events and reportage style.
